TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SessionStateStoreProviderBase extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class SessionStateStoreProviderBase Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 定义数据存储区的会话状态提供程序所需的成员。

span.span: Defines the required members of a session-state provider for a data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 会话状态使用会话状态存储提供程序从数据存储区读取会话数据并将其写入数据存储区。ASP.NET session state reads and writes session data from and to a data store using a session-state store provider. 会话状态存储提供程序是继承抽象类的类, 并使用特定于数据存储的实现替代其成员。A session-state store provider is a class that inherits the abstract class and overrides its members with implementations specific to the data store. 会话状态存储提供程序在处理 ASP.NET 页期间由类调用, 以与用于存储和检索会话变量的数据存储区和相关会话信息 (如超时值) 进行通信。The session-state store provider is called by the class during the processing of an ASP.NET page to communicate with the data store for the storage and retrieval of session variables and related session information such as the time-out value. 每个 ASP.NET 应用程序中的会话数据分别存储在每个属性中。Session data within each ASP.NET application is stored separately for each property. ASP.NET 应用程序不共享会话数据。ASP.NET applications do not share session data. 可以通过`sessionState` 将配置元素的`customProvider`属性设置为, 并将属性设置为自定义提供程序的名称, 来指定 ASP.NET 应用程序的自定义实现, 如`mode`本主题的示例中所示。You can specify a custom implementation for an ASP.NET application by setting the `mode` attribute of the `sessionState` configuration element to and the `customProvider` attribute to the name of the custom provider, as shown in the example for this topic. ## 锁定会话存储数据Locking Session Store Data 由于 ASP.NET 应用程序可进行多线程处理以支持响应并发请求, 因此并发请求可能会尝试访问相同的会话信息。Because ASP.NET applications are multithreaded to support responding to concurrent requests, it is possible that concurrent requests might attempt to access the same session information. 请考虑这样一种情况: 框架集中的多个框架都访问同一应用程序。Consider a scenario where multiple frames in a frameset all access the same application. 可以在不同的线程上同时在 Web 服务器上对框架集中的每个帧执行单独的请求。The separate requests for each frame in the frameset can be executed on the Web server concurrently on different threads. 如果每个帧源访问会话状态变量的 ASP.NET 页, 则可以有多个线程并发访问会话存储。If the ASP.NET pages for each frame source access session-state variables, then you could have multiple threads accessing the session store concurrently. 为了避免会话存储区中的数据冲突和意外的会话状态行为, 和类包括了锁定功能, 以独占方式锁定特定会话的会话存储项执行 ASP.NET 页。To avoid data collisions at the session store and unexpected session-state behavior, the and classes include lock functionality that exclusively locks the session store item for a particular session for the duration of the execution of an ASP.NET page. 请注意, 即使将属性标记为`ReadOnly`, 同一应用程序中的其他 ASP.NET 页也可能能够写入会话存储, 因此, 来自存储的只读会话数据的请求可能仍会等待锁定的数据被解脱.Note that even if the attribute is marked as `ReadOnly`, other ASP.NET pages in the same application might be able to write to the session store, so a request for read-only session data from the store might still end up waiting for locked data to be freed. 在请求开始时, 在调用方法时对会话存储数据设置锁。A lock is set on session-store data at the beginning of the request, in the call to the method. 请求完成后, 会在调用方法的过程中释放锁。When the request completes, the lock is released during the call to the method. 如果对象在调用或方法的过程中遇到锁定的会话数据, 它将以半秒的间隔重新请求会话数据, 直到锁定被释放或会话数据已锁定超出了属性的值。If the object encounters locked session data during the call to either the or the method, it will re-request the session data at half-second intervals until either the lock is released or the amount of time that the session data has been locked exceeds the value of the property. 如果超过了执行超时时间, 则对象将调用方法来释放会话存储数据, 并在此时请求会话存储数据。If the execution time out is exceeded, the object will call the method to free the session-store data and request the session-store data at that time. 由于锁定的会话存储数据可能已在调用 当前响应的方法之前, 通过在单独的线程上调用方法来释放, 因此可能会尝试设置和释放会话状态存储数据, 这些数据具有已由另一个会话发布和修改。Because locked session-store data might have been freed by a call to the method on a separate thread before the call to the method for the current response, an attempt could be made to set and release session-state store data that has already been released and modified by another session. 若要避免这种情况 , 和方法将返回一个锁标识符。To avoid this situation, the and methods return a lock identifier. 此锁定标识符必须包含在每个请求中以修改锁定的会话存储数据。This lock identifier must be included with each request to modify locked session-store data. 仅当数据存储区中的锁标识符与所提供的锁标识符相匹配时, 才会修改会话存储数据。Session-store data is modified only if the lock identifier in the data store matches the lock identifier supplied by the . ## 删除过期的会话存储数据Deleting Expired Session Store Data 如果为特定会话调用了 方法,则使用方法从数据存储区中删除该会话的数据;否则,数据将保留在会话数据存储中,以便为该会话提供服务器未来的请求。When the method is called for a particular session, the data for that session is deleted from the data store using the method; otherwise, the data will remain in the session data store to server future requests for the session. 这是由实现来删除过期的会话数据的。It is up to the implementation to delete expired session data. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). 下面的代码示例显示了配置为使用自定义会话状态存储提供程序的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that is configured to use a custom session-state store provider. ``` ```

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要为继承抽象类的类实现构造函数。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 实现的初始化值将传递给方法实现。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件期间, 对象会在ASP.NET页请求开始时调用方法。 The object calls the method at the beginning of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 如果是以下情况, 则调用方法:The method is called if: - 传入请求没有会话 ID, 或the incoming request has no session ID, or - 传入的请求具有会话 ID, 但在数据存储中找不到该会话。the incoming request has a session ID, but the session is not found in the data store. 方法使用空 对象 、 `timeout`集合和指定的值创建一个新的对象。 The method creates a new object with an empty object, an collection, and the specified `timeout` value. 可以使用方法检索 ASP.NET 应用程序的集合。 The collection for the ASP.NET application can be retrieved using the method. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 将新的会话状态项添加到数据存储区中。

span.span: Adds a new session-state item to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当和`regenerateExpiredSessionId`属性均`true`为时, 方法与会话一起使用。 `cookieless`The method is used with sessions when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both `true`. `true` 如果设置为, 则在遇到过期值时使对象生成新值。 `regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute`Having the `regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute` set to `true` causes the object to generate a new value when an expired value is encountered. 生成新值的过程需要将浏览器重定向到包含新生成的值的 URL。The process of generating a new value requires redirecting the browser to a URL that contains the newly generated value. 方法在包含过期值的初始请求期间调用。 The method is called during the initial request that contains an expired value. 在对象获取用于替换过期 值的新值后, 它会调用方法, 将未初始化的项添加到会话状态数据存储区。 After the object acquires a new value to replace the expired value, it calls the method to add an uninitialized entry to the session-state data store. 然后, 浏览器将重定向到包含新生成的值的 URL。The browser is then redirected to the URL containing the newly generated value. 会话数据存储中的未初始化条目的存在确保了包含新生成的值的重定向请求不会被误认为已过期会话的请求, 而是被视为新会话。The existence of the uninitialized entry in the session data store ensures that the redirected request that includes the newly generated value is not mistaken for a request for an expired session and is, instead, treated as a new session. 会话数据存储中的未初始化的条目与新生成的值相关联, 并且仅包含默认值, 包括过期日期和时间以及与的`actionFlags` 参数相对应的值。和方法。The uninitialized entry in the session data store is associated with the newly generated value and contains only default values, including an expiration date and time and a value that corresponds to the `actionFlags` parameter of the and methods. 会话状态存储中的未初始化条目应包含`actionFlags`等于枚举值的值。The uninitialized entry in the session-state store should include an `actionFlags` value equal to the enumeration value. 此值 通过和方法传递给对象, 并通知对象当前会话是新的、未初始化的会话。 This value is passed to the object by the and methods, and informs the object that the current session is a new but uninitialized session. 然后 , 对象将初始化新会话并`Session_OnStart`引发事件。The object will then initialize the new session and raise the `Session_OnStart` event. 有关无 cookie 会话的详细信息, 请参阅属性。For more information about cookieless sessions, see the property. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 释放由 实现使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在应用程序域的关闭时执行 方法时,将调用方法。The method is called when the method executes at the closing of the application domain. 继承类的类可使用此方法释放不再使用的任何资源。Classes that inherit the class can use this method to free any resources no longer in use. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件期间, 对象会在ASP.NET页请求结束时调用方法。 The object calls the method at the end of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 你可以使用方法执行会话状态存储提供程序所需的每个请求清理。You can use the method to perform any per-request cleanup required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 从会话数据存储区中返回只读会话状态数据。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 使用会话数据存储区中的会话值和信息填充的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`ReadOnly`时, 对象会在请求开始时调用方法。 The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`. 如果特性设置为, `true` 则对象改为调用方法。 If the attribute is set to `true`, the object instead calls the method. 方法返回一个对象, 该对象使用数据存储区中的会话信息进行填充, 并更新会话数据的到期日期。 The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store and updates the expiration date of the session data. 如果在数据存储区中找不到任何会话项数据, 则该方法`locked`会`out`将`false`参数设置`null`为并返回。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 这会导致对象调用方法, 以在数据存储区中创建新的会话项。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果在数据存储区中找到会话项数据, 但数据被锁定, 则该方法`out` `locked` `out`将参数设置为`true`, 并将`lockAge`参数设置为当前日期和时间减去日期当项被锁定 (从数据存储中检索) 和时间时, 将`lockId` `out`参数设置为从数据存储中检索到的锁标识符, 并返回`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 这会导致对象在半秒间隔后再次调用方法, 以尝试检索会话项信息。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information. 如果将`out`参数的值`lockAge`设置为超出该值, 则对象将调用方法以清除对会话项数据的锁定, 然后再次调用方法。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceed the value, then the object calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. 当`actionFlags` `cookieless`和`true`特性都设置为时, 将使用参数。 `regenerateExpiredSessionId`The `actionFlags` parameter is used when both the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are set to `true`. 值设置为指示会话数据存储区中的条目是需要初始化的新会话。 `actionFlags`An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 会话数据存储中未初始化的条目是通过调用方法创建的。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果会话数据存储区中的项不是未初始化的项, `actionFlags`则该参数将设置为零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支持无 cookie 会话的自定义会话状态存储实现程序应`actionFlags`将`out`参数设置为从当前项的会话数据存储区中返回的值。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果请求`actionFlags`的会话存储项的参数值等于枚举值, 则在设置`actionFlags` `out`参数后 , 该方法应将数据存储中的值设置为零。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.span: 当此方法返回时，如果成功获得锁定，请包含一个设置为 的布尔值；否则请包含一个设置为 的布尔值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a Boolean value that is set to if a lock is successfully obtained; otherwise, .

param.name: lockAge
param.span: 当此方法返回时，请包含一个设置为会话数据存储区中的项锁定时间的 对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a object that is set to the amount of time that an item in the session data store has been locked.

param.name: lockId
param.span: 当此方法返回时，请包含一个设置为当前请求的锁定标识符的对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains an object that is set to the lock identifier for the current request.

param.span: 有关锁定标识符的详细信息，请参见 类摘要中的“锁定会话存储区数据”。

span.span: For details on the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class summary.

param.name: actions
param.span: 当此方法返回时，请包含 值之一，指示当前会话是否为未初始化的无 Cookie 会话。

span.span: When this method returns, contains one of the values, indicating whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

summary.span: 从会话数据存储区中返回只读会话状态数据。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 使用会话数据存储区中的会话值和信息填充的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`(默认值) 时 , 对象在请求开始时调用方法。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果特性设置为, `ReadOnly` 则对象改为调用方法。 If the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`, the object instead calls the method. 方法返回一个对象, 该对象使用数据存储区中的会话信息进行填充, 更新存储数据的到期日期, 并在请求期间锁定数据存储区中的会话项数据。 The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store, updates the expiration date of the stored data, and locks the session-item data at the data store for the duration of the request. 如果在数据存储区中找不到任何会话项数据, 则该方法`locked`会`out`将`false`参数设置`null`为并返回。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 这会导致对象调用方法, 以在数据存储区中创建新的会话项。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果在数据存储区中找到会话项数据, 但数据被锁定, 则该方法`out` `locked` `out`将参数设置为`true`, 并将`lockAge`参数设置为当前日期和时间减去日期当项被锁定 (从数据存储中检索) 和时间时, 将`lockId` `out`参数设置为从数据存储中检索到的锁标识符, 并返回`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 这会导致对象在半秒间隔后再次调用方法, 以尝试检索会话项信息并获取数据锁。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information and obtain a lock on the data. 如果将`out`参数设置为`lockAge`的值超出该值, 则会调用方法清除对会话项数据的锁定, 然后再次调用方法。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceeds the value, then the calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. `actionFlags` 当`cookieless`和`true`特性都设置为时, 将使用参数。 `regenerateExpiredSessionId`The `actionFlags` parameter is used when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both set to `true`. 值设置为指示会话数据存储区中的条目是需要初始化的新会话。 `actionFlags`An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 会话数据存储中未初始化的条目是通过调用方法创建的。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果会话数据存储区中的项不是未初始化的项, `actionFlags`则该参数将设置为零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支持无 cookie 会话的自定义会话状态存储实现程序应`actionFlags`将`out`参数设置为从当前项的会话数据存储区中返回的值。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果请求`actionFlags`的会话存储项的参数值等于枚举值, 则在设置`actionFlags` `out`参数后 , 该方法应将数据存储中的值设置为零。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 由 对象调用，以便进行每次请求初始化。

span.span: Called by the object for per-request initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象在调用任何其他方法之前调用方法。 The object calls the method before calling any other method. 你可以使用方法执行会话状态存储提供程序所需的每个请求初始化。You can use the method to perform any per-request initialization required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

Public MustOverride Sub ReleaseItemExclusive (context As HttpContext, id As String, lockId As Object)

param.name: context

summary.span: 释放对会话数据存储区中项的锁定。

span.span: Releases a lock on an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法来更新过期日期, 并释放会话数据存储区中某个项的锁。The object calls the method to update the expiration date and release a lock on an item in the session data store. 在事件发生时, 如果会话值不变, 则会在请求结束时调用此方法。It is called at the end of a request, during the event, if session values are unchanged. 如果会话值已修改, 则对象改为调用方法。If session values have been modified, the object instead calls the method. 当 会话数据存储区中某个项的锁超出该值时, 该对象也会调用方法。The object also calls the method when a lock on an item in the session data store has exceeded the value. 有关锁定的详细信息以及有关锁定标识符的详细信息, 请参阅类概述中的 "锁定会话存储数据"。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. 方法只会从当前应用程序的会话数据存储区中移除与所提供的会话`id`和`lockId`值匹配的项的锁。 The method only removes the lock from an item in the session data store for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values. 如果与数据存储中的不匹配, 则此方法不执行任何操作。 `lockId`If the `lockId` does not match the one in the data store, the method does nothing. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

span.span: The that represents the item to delete from the data store.

summary.span: 删除会话数据存储区中的项数据。

span.span: Deletes item data from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用了方法 , 则对象将在事件期间的请求结束时调用方法, 以从会话数据存储区中删除会话项的数据。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to delete the data for a session item from the session data store if the method has been called. 仅删除当前应用程序中与提供的会话`id`和`lockId`值匹配的会话数据。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is deleted. 有关锁定的详细信息以及有关锁定标识符的详细信息, 请参阅类概述中的 "锁定会话存储数据"。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 更新会话数据存储区中的项的到期日期和时间。

span.span: Updates the expiration date and time of an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法, 以便在以下任一操作时, 将会话的到期日期和时间更新为当前日期和时间加上会话值: The object calls the method to update the expiration date and time for a session to the current date and time plus the session value when either: - 属性为`true`或the attribute is `true`, or - 由于出现错误 , 请求未引发和事件。the request did not raise the and events due to an error. 如果请求 ASP.NET 页并且属性设置为`false`, 则仍将调用方法来更新会话数据存储中数据的到期日期和时间。If an ASP.NET page is requested and the attribute is set to `false`, the method is still called to update the expiration date and time of the data in the session data store. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: to identify the session item as a new item; to identify the session item as an existing item.

summary.span: 使用当前请求中的值更新会话状态数据存储区中的会话项信息，并清除对数据的锁定。

span.span: Updates the session-item information in the session-state data store with values from the current request, and clears the lock on the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象在事件结束时调用方法, 以将当前会话项信息插入到数据存储中, 或使用当前值更新数据存储区中的现有会话项信息。 更新项的过期时间, 以及释放对数据的锁定。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to insert current session-item information into the data store or update existing session-item information in the data store with current values, to update the expiration time on the item, and to release the lock on the data. 仅更新与所提供的会话`id`和`lockId`值匹配的当前应用程序的会话数据。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is updated. 有关锁定的详细信息, 请参阅类概述中的 "锁定会话存储数据"。For more information about locking, see "Locking Session Store Data" in the class overview. 如果尚未修改当前请求的会话值, 则不会调用此方法。If the session values for the current request have not been modified, the method is not called. 相反, 将调用方法。Instead, the method is called. 如果已调用 方法,则不会调用方法。If the method has been called, the method is not called. 相反, 对象调用方法以从数据源中删除会话项数据。Instead, the object calls the method to delete session-item data from the data source. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.span: 对 Global.asax 文件中定义的 事件的 委托。

span.span: The delegate for the event defined in the Global.asax file.

summary.span: 设置对 Global.asax 文件中定义的 事件的 委托的引用。

span.span: Sets a reference to the delegate for the event defined in the Global.asax file.

returns.span: 如果会话状态存储提供程序支持调用 事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the session-state store provider supports calling the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Session_OnEnd` 对象在初始化模块时调用方法, 以确定实现是否支持对事件的调用并将委托与 `Session_OnEnd`事件。The object calls the method when the module is initialized to determine whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported by the implementation and to associate the delegate with the `Session_OnEnd` event. 自定义会话状态存储提供程序实现器应使用方法通知对象是否支持对事件的`Session_OnEnd`调用, 以及设置对所提供 的委托的本地引用。`expireCallback`参数。Custom session-state store provider implementers should use the method to inform the object whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported and to set a local reference to the delegate supplied by the `expireCallback` parameter. 自定义实现必须确定何时调用本地委托。The custom implementation must decide when the local delegate will be called. 例如, 可以在调用方法期间调用委托, 在放弃会话时调用该委托。For example, the delegate could be called during the call to the method, which is called when a session is abandoned. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview
